nodes.description: 1994年7月18日，伊朗支持的黎巴嫩真主党在布宜诺斯艾利斯AMIA犹太慈善协会总部发动爆炸袭击，造成85人死亡、300人受伤
nodes.support_text: Prosecutors formally charged Iran and the Shiite militia Hezbollah Wednesday in the 1994 bombing of a Jewish charities office in Argentina, which killed 85 people and injured 300.

nodes.description: 阿根廷检察官阿尔贝托·尼曼斯在周三正式指控伊朗和真主党为此次袭击负责，并证明袭击决策由伊朗最高领导层下达
nodes.support_text: Prosecutors called for the arrest of top Iranian authorities at the time, including then-president Ali Rafsanjani.

nodes.description: 指控要求逮捕包括时任伊朗总统阿里·拉菲桑贾尼在内的多名伊朗高层人员
nodes.support_text: Prosecutors called for the arrest of top Iranian authorities at the time, including then-president Ali Rafsanjani.

nodes.description: 该事件发生后超过十一年间，阿根廷最严重的恐怖袭击案件仍未有任何人被审判
nodes.support_text: No one has been tried for the crime in more than a decade since Argentina's worst-ever terror attack.
